dmca.title: Clothier Rolls Up Sleeves in Domain Name Dispute
dmca.body:
I represent that men's clothing store, Aala Reed. It has come to our attention that one or both of you are the registrants of the domain name "aalareed.com", the exact name of my client's business. Furthermore, you are using this domain name to maintain a Website intentionally to tarnish and/or disparage "Aala Reed", in violation of, among other things, the Anticybersquatting Consumer Protection Act of 1999, which is embodied in the Lanham Act.

You are hereby warned and notified to Cease and Desist your use of "www.aalareed.com" as a domain name, which you have obviously registered and continue to use in bad faith. If you do not, within seven (7) days from your receipt of this letter, (a) take down all content from the Website "aalareed.com", and (b) take all steps necessary to transfer this domain name to my client free of charge, we will take all action necessary to protect our rights, including, without limitation, filing a lawsuit. If you fail to comply, you could incur liability for damages in excess of $100,000 and responsibility for attorney's fees. This letter is sent to you without prejudice to Aala Reed's rights, claims and remedies, all of which are hereby reserved.
